Wheeljack-X::

The bot rises somewhat shakily to his feet.  "Yeah, I'm an Autobot 
all right.  The name's Wheeljack-X; Jackie for short."  He looks 
around.  "I ended up here after running from some space pirates.  
They're here too - somewhere ..."
